participant_1.background:
I write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.
i go to the theater to watch plays.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
i used to smoke.
I'm not very close to my parents, but I try to be there for them when I can.

participant_2.background:
I have 2 sisters, but I'm not sure if my car is sentient.
my favorite place to travel is jamaica.
i am a house wife.
I enjoy spending my free time cosplaying with my husband.
I like to spend my spare time reading about science fiction while drinking hot chocolate.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to cosplay with my husband, and I read science fiction when I have free time.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go to the theater, and I write stories.
What kind of stories do you write?
I write science fiction and fantasy stories. I like to create worlds that are different from our own.
That sounds really cool! I love reading science fiction.
Do you have a favorite book?
I don't have a favorite book, but I really enjoy the Ender's Game series.
I've heard good things about that series! I've been meaning to read it.
You should! It's a great series.
I'm sure I will. Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to travel. My favorite place to travel is Jamaica.
Jamaica sounds like a beautiful place. I've never been there, but I'd love to go someday.
You should! It's a great place to relax and have fun.
I'm sure it is. It sounds like you have a lot of great hobbies.
I do! I try to keep myself busy.
That's good to hear. I'm the same way. I like to keep busy.
It's important to have things to do.
I agree. It's what makes life fun.
